title: Bernie Sanders’ latest burden: ‘help’ from ‘The Squad’
text:
Poor Bernie Sanders: First, plummeting polls, then a heart attack — and now “The Squad” of far-left House freshwomen is rushing to his “support.”

Sorry: Democratic Socialists won’t bring many new votes to a guy who’s been a proud Socialist since before they were born.

And these loose cannons carry a lot of baggage, from Ilhan Omar and Rashida Tlaib’s anti-Israel hate to Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez’s careless extremism, such as the Green New Deal fine print fuming about cow farts.

Hasn’t Bernie suffered enough?
description: Sorry: Democratic Socialists won’t bring many new votes to a guy who’s been a proud Socialist since before they were born.
